snippet: Parliament voted out Mustafa Abu Shagour, the newly elected prime minister, after rejecting his attempt to form a Cabinet and government.
abstract: Libyan Parliament votes to dismiss Prime Min Mustafa Abu Shagour, deepening the country's leadership crisis.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya.

lead_paragraph: Parliament voted out Mustafa Abu Shagour, the newly elected prime minister, after rejecting his attempt to form a Cabinet and government.

headline.seo: Abu Shagour Dismissed as Libya’s Prime Minister
headline.print_headline: Libya Dismisses Prime Minister, Widening a Power Vacuum

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
